text:
Juji | San Jose, CA | Fulltime | Onsite | https://juji.io/fullstack

Juji, Inc. is building an AI platform that focuses on understanding and helping individuals. We are funded by both US government and VC, with repeating paying customers. We are looking for talented software engineers to join our engineering team. Our stack includes Clojure/Clojurescript, Datomic, Postgres, Kafka, Docker, AWS.
